Immunities.string: and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

Languages.string: understands the language of its creator

MonsterTrait.Name: Immutable Form
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Gaze of Ancient Light (Recharge 6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem emits a burst of blinding light, affecting all opponents within 30 feet who are visible to it. These creatures must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be permanently blinded. All affected creatures, including those that save successfully, are stunned until the end of their next turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Primal Voice of Doom (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The golem intones a disturbing invocation of the sun god. Creatures within 30 feet of the golem must make a successful DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened Deaf or unhearing creatures are unaffected.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shoot into the Sun (1 minute/day)
MonsterTrait.Text: When roused for combat, the golem opens many of its eyes, emitting blinding light. All ranged attacks, including ranged spells that require a spell attack roll, are made with disadvantage against the golem. The effect persists as long as the eye golem desires, up to a total of 1 minute (10 rounds) per day.
